remarks: Composition in the category of rings.  (Contributed by AV, 14-Feb-2020.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ringcbasOLD.c $e |- C = ( RingCatOLD ` U ) $.
ringcbasOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
ringcbasOLD.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
ringccoOLD.o $e |- .x. = ( comp ` C ) $.
ringccofvalOLD $p |- ( ph -> .x. = ( v e. ( B X. B ) , z e. B |-> ( g e. ( ( 2nd ` v ) RingHom z ) , f e. ( ( 1st ` v ) RingHom ( 2nd ` v ) ) |-> ( g o. f ) ) ) ) $.
$d B v z $.
$d U v z $.
$d f g v z $.
$d ph v z $.
